title: mp_diffpow.sh
description: Generates a file with specific motion parameter calculations useful for accounting for 'spin history' effects and other variations not accounted for by motion correction.

reg_file.title: Registration parameter file
reg_file.description: Input file containing registration parameters (e.g., regparam.dat)

diff_reg_file.title: Differenced registration parameter file
diff_reg_file.description: Output file with differenced registration parameters (e.g., diffregparam.dat)
